name: A Very Typical Farm
description:
Submission for the Major Jam 2... with "love" as the them!

This is the final version of all the art we used on a single sprite sheet!

Grow boyfriends and hangout in your town! Relax and make some cash. Fish and garden to your heart's content in a relaxing town setting... just be careful of those darn thieving imps!

This game was a team effort! Thanks for all the hard work https://flowoop.itch.io/!

Sounds we used are from https://freesound.org/

And here's a PDF with all the awesome sounds we used and a link to their creators:

https://docs.google.com/document/d/1yHO-gUr53sFFXuqzRw19Ig6NrrSs5q-gQHkjnyXnUq8/...
